name: Mediterranean Zoodles with Shrimp
author: France C
summary: This low-carb pasta alternative gets topped with shrimp, olives, tomatoes, and feta for a healthy and quick meal. Take care not to overcook the zucchini noodles to prevent them from becoming mushy.
ingredients: 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
salt and ground black pepper to taste
⅓ cup pitted Kalamata olives, coarsely chopped
4 medium zucchini, cut into noodles with a spiralizer
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat and saute garlic until fragrant, 10 to 15 seconds
Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper
Cook until shrimp are pink, 2 to 3 minutes on each side
Add cherry tomatoes and olives to the skillet and cook until tomatoes begin to soften, 2 to 3 minutes
Add zucchini noodles, oregano, lemon juice, salt, and pepper
Keep cooking, stirring frequently, until zoodles are tender yet firm to the bite, 3 to 4 minutes
Return shrimp to the skillet and top with feta cheese
Toss to combine and serve immediately
